attributes.action: Think before Introducing Pass Port Interviews when applying for your first or renewal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Have you consider the the following points.
1. number of staff needed.cost involved IT WON'T STOP FORGERIES
2. Cost of Interpreters needed to Translate those unable to speak english. EU CITIZENS GET theirs outside UK.  
3. WASTE OF TAXPAYERS MONEY. Better to sort out the problem of Theft from mail/passport office.Driving Licence are obtained by false means. others taking the test. and so will passports.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Passport/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
